title: Southern Belle. Part 1
brief_description: This video is the first part of Greg Graingers journey into the Southern part of the United States. Visit states such as Tennessee, Louisiana, Georgia, Alabama, Mississippi, South Carolina and Florida, take time to meet with a wealth of Southern characters and experience the life and customs of the south in a very upbeat and entertaining manner. Visit Dollywood (centre of the business empire of Dolly Parton) and Gracelands (home of the legendary Elvis Presley), paddlewheel down the Mississippi and travel to Nashville for a country music bonanza.
